mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.date AS "date", a.location AS "location", a.responsible AS "responsible", a.problem AS "problem", a.requirements AS "requirements", a.deadline AS "deadline", a.amount AS "amount", a.correctacction AS "correctacction", a.confirm AS "confirm", a.confirmdate AS "confirmdate", a.type AS "type", a.file AS "file", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO czz_yhpc( id, name, date, location, responsible, problem, requirements, deadline, amount, correctacction, confirm, confirmdate, type, file, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{date}, #{location}, #{responsible}, #{problem}, #{requirements}, #{deadline}, #{amount}, #{correctacction}, #{confirm}, #{confirmdate}, #{type}, #{file}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
